# How old were the Danish starting 11?

The following players

|     |                       |                            |
|-----|-----------------------|----------------------------|
|     |                       |                            |
| 1   | Kasper Schmeichel     | 5 November 1986 (aged 37)  |
|     |                       |                            |
| 2   | Joachim Andersen      | 31 May 1996 (aged 28)      |
|     |                       |                            |
| 3   | Jannik Vestergaard    | 3 August 1992 (aged 31)    |
|     |                       |                            |

|     |                       |                            |

::: {.cell}

:::


The color of love, the color of blood The color of roses, the color of
mud The color of passion, the color of fire The color of anger, the
color of desire The color of danger, the color of heat The color of
victory, the color of defeat The color of life, the color of death The
color of courage, the color of breath The color of war, the color of
peace The color of joy, the color of grief The color of power, the color
of pain The color of sunshine, the color of rain The color of beauty,
the color of sin The color of the world we live in The color of red, so
bold and bright The color of day, the color of night

So, for the first time ever, or at least as far as I know, we have had a
totally unforeseen outcome. Belgium lost to Slovaika.

The red color in the graph tells us how much each of us lost in the
prediction. The more red, the more we lost. My 4-1 bet cost me 16
points.


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/graph-1.png){width=100%}
:::
:::


Halvard lost less than Øyvind, and the two share the top spot. Dagfinn
also closed in on the top. Felix did the opposite and there is again a
significant gap.
